table_caption: Clusters showing significantly larger activity for the affect-incongruent vs the affect-congruent conditions (emotion-control effect)
table_foot: Coordinates are defined in MNI (x, y, z) space. The p values represent the FWE cluster-level corrected values for the whole-brain analyses and FWE voxel-level corrected values for the VOI analyses. IFG, Inferior frontal gyrus; L, left; R, right; SPL, superior parietal lobule.
